about_the_game:
Fate and Judgement is a vertical shoot'em up, a bullet hell game with roguelike elements where you'll be able to make your build as you go through procedurally generated levels. Fight Through hordes of an empire you once served and relieve your last mission until victory is yours!

Playable Characters



  • Codename Fate: A skillful and determined pilot. She is the best of her class and ready to fight. Her ship shots spread patterns destroying ships throught all of the screen!

  • Codename Judge: An Admiral of the Space Guard. Uncle of Fate. He uncovered a project of a ship capable of flying through time and space. Then they are destined to relieve their last mission until victory. His ship spread pattern is more focused giving more damage to single units.

    Features

  • 2 Playable Characters
  • Local and online Coop
  • Branching Paths
  • 40 Different Skill Cards to Upgrade Your Ship
  • Over 20 Weapons
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Lots Of Bullets!

name: Fate and Judgement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer versions
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS locked

short_description: Fate and Judgement is a vertical shoot'em up with roguelike elements and procedural stage generation. Fight Through hordes of an empire you once served and relieve your last mission until victory is yours!
